website_summaries.verdict: Nice cooker for camping and easy to put together. Cooks french fries and chicken wings fast.
pros: Comes with pot and basket for chicken and fish
You might be able to attach it to your current grill's established hose and start frying fast
Food comes out even and consistent
Good if you are looking for something for outdoor frying
cons: Pan is thin and might result in burning oil, as well as food

customer_reviews.title: Great fish fryer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my father who wanted to do some fish frying. Honestly I didn't even know these existed! It reminds me of a small turkey fryer in all honesty. But it does a great job frying fish.
customer_reviews.author: Jen G.

customer_reviews.title: Don't Bother
customer_reviews.text: had to return two of these because the hose at the beginning of the burner melted on both of them only after two uses. Obviously a poor design.
customer_reviews.author: robert parker

customer_reviews.title: Missing Pieces
customer_reviews.text: A few pieces were missing. I wasnt happy about this at all. I spent addtl cash at Home Depot in order to get some parts to stay together.
customer_reviews.author: tanisha

customer_reviews.title: It does what it's supposed to do.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. It does what it's supposed to do, for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Anderson

customer_reviews.title: much cheaper elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: found it $30 cheaper at Mernards, DANG oh, I used my own lid. It states it does not come with a lid on the description so I don't know why they would give less stars. I gave less stars because they marked it down like it was a good deal but it wasn't !!!
customer_reviews.author: Androgyny

customer_reviews.title: 10 quart is perfect size for a good batch of wings or fish
customer_reviews.text: Assembly required but after ten minutes had it put together. 10 quart is perfect size for a good batch of wings or fish! Great price too!
customer_reviews.author: Zachary white

customer_reviews.title: Recomended
customer_reviews.text: Great little unit. Does exactly what it's intended to do.
customer_reviews.author: walter w.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice we built a small table for it to sit ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice we built a small table for it to sit on so it wasn't so low to the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Chaffin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great. such a great buy also!! Very happy with this Fryer.
customer_reviews.author: peppermint

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We love it. We use it camping for frying sliced potatoes and French fries. Easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne M Sanford

customer_reviews.title: pan is too thin, burns oil when cooking which ...
customer_reviews.text: pan is too thin, burns oil when cooking which leads to burnt food.... I would not refer to other to purchase
customer_reviews.author: PB

customer_reviews.title: Does what it's supposed to.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this fryer for a Superbowl party just to cook chicken wings. It cooked 30 pounds of chicken wings with no issues. The paint will burn off almost immediately so don't expect it to last. I am going try painting it again with a quality high temp paint. The regulator seems a little cheap but functional. Really can't complain too much, it worked as it should. Not sure how durable it will be in the long run but I am not going to be using it all that much. I would say it's average china quality.
customer_reviews.author: dviper1712

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great fryer second time purchasing replacement parts difficult to locate
customer_reviews.author: Butta Factory

customer_reviews.title: Great for outdoor frying
customer_reviews.text: Great for outdoor frying. Takes a bit to heat up, but when it does it is consistent and even.
customer_reviews.author: Randall Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I dont care for this item. I wish I would have ordered a much higher stove.
customer_reviews.author: Oswald Sands

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use just took the hose from my gas grill and attached it to the fryer with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Y. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Used this for a fish fry several times during the year. Also cooked wing dings in it. Just watch the temperature on it it get really hot but great product.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Lyn

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: the fryer is great, can use burner for larger pots as for a turkey fryer, works as expected in ad, great value for price, comes with fryer pot for chicken or fish and basket
customer_reviews.author: Mary Fritz

customer_reviews.title: Great Fryer!!
customer_reviews.text: This fryer was extremely easy to assemble and just as easy to use. We were worried that it would be hard to regulate the temperature for best frying, but our fears turned out to be groundless. There is a regulator to use for that and it worked awesomely. It was a breeze to clean as well. We purchased this so that we could enjoy fried foods without having our kitchen and home smell like a local diner. This is a great buy for frying chicken, seafood - you name it. (Except turkeys of course as this is not a turkey fryer). The one and only reason I gave this 4 stars is that it does not come with a lid.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda

customer_reviews.title: NOT ORIGINAL PACKAGING
customer_reviews.text: THE BOX WAS TAPED CLOSED, MY FIRST CLUE THAT SOMETHING WAS AMISS----THE ORIGINAL PACKAGES FOR THE ASSEMBLY PARTS WERE OPEN AND EMPTY. SOME OF THE NUT AND BOLTS WERE IN A SANDWHICH BAG AND THE REST WERE LOOSE IN THE BOX. THE UNIT DID NOT APPEAR USED BUT, WHY THE SLOPPY REPACKAGING. THE INSTRUCTIONS WERE SKETCHY TO NON-EXISTENT WHEN IT CAME TO THE PROPANE CONNECTION. THE THEROMETER WOULD NOT WOULD ALLOW ROOM FOR THE BASKET. DISAPPOINTING AT BEST
customer_reviews.author: MRM

customer_reviews.title: This is good for hungry guys but terrible for kids
customer_reviews.text: This is good for hungry guys but terrible for kids. The kids can eat the food though. Watch out because the food is bad for you and you'll go fat if you eat it a lot. The only reason it's not 5 is because the little leg stabilizer ring doesn't stay on.
customer_reviews.author: goughmax

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother purchasing this.....
customer_reviews.text: This was a major disappointmemt; was missing screws and had to retun it since I had to go with an alternative.
customer_reviews.author: OH DIVA

customer_reviews.title: Great product I gave it four stars because it did ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product I gave it four stars because it did not come with a lid
customer_reviews.author: yuni

customer_reviews.title: This is NOT a turkey fryer REPEAT  this is NOT a turkey fryer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as an outdoor deep fryer that I expected to later be able to use as a turkey fryer. Based on the product description you would think it was but when I received the product in big bold letters it stated "THIS IS NOT FOR FRYING TURKEYS" because I needed it for a party I was forced to use it or else I would have returned it. It seems like a nice solid outdoor NOT TURKEY fryer.
customer_reviews.author: Big.0cean

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: . My sister purchased this for my mother for mother's day she uses it all the time
customer_reviews.author: Miki Hues

customer_reviews.title: Great for frying fish
customer_reviews.text: Great for frying fish, hush puppies, french fries and more. Family loves it and made a great fathers day surprise for me!!!
customer_reviews.author: JediMaster

customer_reviews.title: Happy with product
customer_reviews.text: We have been very happy with this fryer. Nice size for being able to deep fry a larger quantity of food
customer_reviews.author: EmilyK

product_meta.title: Masterbuilt MB10 Outdoor LP Gas 10-quart Fryer and Seafood Kettle
product_meta.description: Known for quality and innovation, Masterbuilt's cooking products set the standard.
feature_bullets: Outdoor cooker and fryer with 10-quart aluminum pot and basket
Solid-steel 15-inch LP gas-cooker stand and cast-iron burner
Stainless-steel thermometer for checking on heat at a glance
Type-1 regulator and hose; requires a propane tank (sold separately)
Measures approximately 13 by 13 by 24 inches; 5-year limited warranty

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars55 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
